page.title: 16Home Life 1985
page.content: At home I went into the kitchen and got a packet of crisps.I went up stairs and opened the window and looked out.I saw my brother playing football with my dog.I watched for a little while and then played with my Barbie(a doll). I played with it until tea time.For tea I had a salad with chicken, tomato,cucumber and other things.I was watching Rolf Harris cartoon time while eating my tea.After tea I went outside to play tennis.I played that for a while.Then my brother and dad came out and we played catch with three balls.We all had to throw at the same time.We played other games as well.I did handstands and cartwheels.Then I went to bed & read. by Tina Nicklen Age 9
